scripts.make: pnpm run build && cp -R dist/cli ../cli && cd ../cli && npm i && cp -R ../cenv-mono/dist/ui node_modules/@stoked-cenv/ui && cp -R ../cenv-mono/dist/lib node_modules/@stoked-cenv/lib
scripts.rebuild: pnpm -r exec npx rimraf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml; pnpm i; pnpm run build
scripts.version:deps: echo pnpm $(pnpm --version); echo tsc $(tsc --version); echo node $(node --version); nx --version; cenv --version
scripts.version:bump: pnpm -r run version:bump prerelease --force && pnpm -r up "@stoked-cenv/*" && git add package.json packages/cli/package.json packages/ui/package.json packages/lib/package.json packages/cdk/package.json pnpm-lock.yaml && git commit -m "push bump packages" && git push && pnpm version prerelease && git push
scripts.publish:bump: pnpm run version:bump && pnpm run build && pnpm --filter "@stoked-cenv/*" run publish:bump --publish-branch $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
